query: I need to integrate with the VendorX API but their docs are terrible. Research how their authentication works before we write any code.
This bug keeps happening intermittently and I have no idea what causes it. Let's investigate before trying random fixes.
We need to call a COM interop method but I'm not sure about the threading model. Look into it.
Before implementing the Kafka consumer, read the vendor documentation and extract the relevant constraints.
The error only happens when two modules interact. Investigate the cross-module data flow to find the root cause.
I want to use this new SDK but I've never worked with it. Research how it handles batch operations.
This gRPC call fails with code 14 but only under load. We need to trace through the call chain to understand why.
Check what existing FINDINGs and LEARNEDs we have about the payment gateway before starting new work.
The error message is cryptic. Delegate reading through the 200-page SDK reference to a sub-agent and extract what we need.
We're about to integrate with a proprietary system we haven't used before. What do we need to research first?
Add a new endpoint to the Express router for user profile updates.
The button color should be blue, not green. Fix it in the CSS.
Run the test suite and tell me which tests are failing.
Create a design document for the new notification system.
Compact the context, it's getting too large.
Let's finalize this bead and close it.
Write a migration script to add the email column to the users table.
Help me rename the getUserById function to findUserById across the codebase.
Set up the constitution.md for this new project.
Deploy the latest build to staging and verify it works.
